attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are fedup with your Government, who seem possessed in hiking prices up to hurt the motorist. Coming up with such crazy schemes as road pricing and road tolls, which would do nothing but hurt the poor people in this country.  In order to keep our jobs we need to be able to travel to work with out the extra added stress of worrying about what stupid ideas is this Government coming up with now. So get out of office!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
